message: Let's start with a fair-ish split. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm sure we can work something out.
Considering the inflation rate, I propose a division that slightly favors me, but still provides a substantial amount for you.
Let's get closer to a 60/40 split. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I need a good chunk of the money to make this worthwhile for me.
